articles.title: Supreme Court Seems Ready to Reject Efforts to Kick Trump Off the Ballot
articles.description: During oral arguments, justices from across the ideological spectrum expressed deep skepticism about Colorado's decision to disqualify Trump under the 14th Amendment's insurrection clause.

articles.title: Microsoft's Copilot app is now available on iOS and Android
articles.description: Microsoft has released its AI-powered Copilot app for iOS and Android devices, offering users access to GPT-4 and DALL-E 3 capabilities for free, marking a significant expansion of its AI tools to mobile platforms.

articles.title: King Charles III diagnosed with cancer, Buckingham Palace announces
articles.description: The British monarch has begun treatment for an unspecified form of cancer discovered during his recent hospital procedure for an enlarged prostate. He will postpone public duties but continue state business.
